text: فَلَمَّآ ءَاتَىٰهُم مِّن فَضۡلِهِۦ بَخِلُواْ بِهِۦ وَتَوَلَّواْ وَّهُم مُّعۡرِضُونَ

translation.en: But when he gave them from His bounty, they were stingy with it and turned away while they refused
translation.id: Ketika Allah memberikan kepada mereka sebagian dari karunia-Nya, mereka menjadi kikir dan berpaling, dan selalu menentang (kebenaran)
